title: Connection Templates
author: fridtjof
body_snippet:
It would be really nice if there was a template system to make creating new connections faster.

Obviously global templates would be good, so I could change the default connection type from RDP to SSH if my environment is more SSH heavy.

Maybe also have an option to "import" a connection as the template for the folder it's currently in. That way, you could set certain settings that should always be set to a default value when creating a new connection in that folder.

comments.snippet:
This is somewhat covered by the current default connectioninfo system that we have, but I like the idea making these more of a template system. This would solve some of the issues around the current system and provide more flexibility without necessarily more complexity.

Related to #238 and #239
comments.author: sparerd
